body_html: @SsnL I followed my gradOutput variable though all it's changes, and I discovered that I had made a typo/wrote the wrong variable name in one my steps. I then added a correction step to compensate for the mistaken variable, and that correction step caused gradOutput to change to a 3D matrix.
body_text: @SsnL I followed my gradOutput variable though all it's changes, and I discovered that I had made a typo/wrote the wrong variable name in one my steps. I then added a correction step to compensate for the mistaken variable, and that correction step caused gradOutput to change to a 3D matrix.
body: @SsnL I followed my `gradOutput` variable though all it's changes, and I discovered that I had made a typo/wrote the wrong variable name in one my steps. I then added a correction step to compensate for the mistaken variable, and that correction step caused `gradOutput` to change to a 3D matrix.
